Reviews.Title: “First class 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: AyyadAyyad
Reviews.Content: good hotel terms location friendly staff easy find central station close dam square etc side room small right next lift heard night long going guests noisey thats hotels fault thin walls quick break paid night worth visit

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: huda71
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights early june great time booked one star rooms found quite great lay bed watch flat screen tv front hanging carpeted wall room wasnt huge didnt problem also glass bathroom funny perhaps entirely suitable travelling friends location perfect mins walk station everywhere else would say location number 1 reason staying found clean friendly everything hoped chain like ramada added bonus reception also room holding luggage late flight

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, OK location”
Reviews.Author: natdh
Reviews.Content: decided take last minute trip amsterdam managed book hotel night rate 99 euros reception staff friendly helpful directions reviewers mentioned walking distance train station best part hotel eat hotel many options nearby stayed double room second floor overlooking street smoking room honestly could tell actually pleasant clean smell throughout hotel room hallways small north american standards however spotless comfortable 2 nights desk chair tv one corner bed nice bedside shelf lamp side convenient open closet small also handy shelves shower excellent height lighting sink area dim good rest room lots natural light good curtains needed window open night ac room weather stay noise street trams completely compared red light district would stay

Reviews.Title: “very good”
Reviews.Author: dog2004
Reviews.Content: minutes away central station trams stopping outside hotel good location anyone wants city despite location beside main road noise levels disturbing even window open star room apparently deluxe room decent standard incl air conditioning though bit small glass cubicle bathroom otherwise notch didnt eat meals hotel since offers continental breakfast buffet restaurants pubs within meters hotel offer much breakfasts pancakes full english etc much less hotel charges ill stay

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: elninomagico
Reviews.Content: quite hotels choose amsterdam glad stayed location fantastic 5 min walk central station dam square stylish lobby rooms small everything need nice clean bathroom didnt need fan ac even sure ac weather wasnt hot window looked shaft runs middle hotel got natural light able tell weather great food around hotel didnt try breakfast lobby bad restaurant hotel wasnt open lunch

Reviews.Title: “A median hotel with an elevator twist”
Reviews.Author: pelicanoPortugal
Reviews.Content: stayed ramada hotel amsterdam centraal location convenient station city center impression decor lobby good well employees bit making one feel like guest despite requests offered smoking room takes additional meaning amsterdam smelled upon entry room window open fan came room much could use risk sleep due noise making room warm humid view piece sheet metal exterior window room small well lit shaving proved challenge dark finally rained quite time day touring city quite disappointed attempted dry shoes hair dryer room work well colleague mine stayed street approximately 30 euros mine also opportunity see room based experience next time think spend bit extra upgrade

Reviews.Title: “We love it!”
Reviews.Author: jcu1963
Reviews.Content: reviewers mentioned great showers great location wouldnt knock hotel proud stylish elegant front lobby lounge area however beyond forget inside hotel one left feeling corridors room double full rate would 200 euros per night small air conditioning window opened onto small central shaft view anything one small noisy fan ease heat room left horribly overpriced poor accommodation wont staying

Reviews.Title: “Bad hotel in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: chanvannak
Reviews.Content: 1st time hotel must say impressed staff friendly helpful everything ran smoothly moment arrived rooms cleaned daily although didnt include fresh new bedding lobby rooms clean well kept mattresses comfortable ive ever bad thing hotel smell right lift room floors smell quite badly compared cleanliness superb location small issue deal fantastic stay certainly going back next visit

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: GlasgowStar
Reviews.Content: certainly worth getting star rooms though quite small amsterdam rooms well equipped well maintained breakfast good staff cheerful great central location good links public transport try humphreys restaurant opposite side road good quality budget meal friendly staff side one lifts incredibly smelly apparently due problem adjoining building whose holiday

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: gena67
Reviews.Content: boyfriend usually go amsterdam twice year beautiful place friends nearby whenever get booking stay ramada particularly cheap price location within 510 minutes centraal station dam square shopping areas many nice restaurants cafes makes worth pretty standard 3 star hotel thing makes us return never even slight problem staff always friendly helpful rooms clean comfortable requests made room service questions work safe different bedding promptly dealt looking somewhere clean comfortable good location reasonable rate always cheaper us booked advance hotel ideal

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Svala
Reviews.Content: ramada amsterdam city centre simple hotel near main train station good hotel always seem coffee available lobby hot breakfast priced nice 10 euros star rooms nothing special worth extra opinion many stay hotel would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mld80
Reviews.Content: stay hotel 3 times always good memory rooms big amsterdam hotel room small room small window perfect

Reviews.Title: “Berlin base”
Reviews.Author: sandSheffield
Reviews.Content: amsterdam ramada city centre date 9 january 2007 reviewer trip advisor member uk returned enjoyable first visit dam people friendly helpful stayed ramada city centre ok yes rooms small tried get us upgrade euros per night declined well later learned people upgraded rooms bigger standard still room cleaned day bed comfy clean towels problem breakfast ok location excellent street dam square weather wet didnt stop us getting around seeing sights anne frank house must see sure good map find way around foot like good steak try dam square near station lovely dutch pancake cafe flower market visited good visit well worth

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: ChestnutandLaguna
Reviews.Content: got back stay ramada hotel actually isnt bad like reviews friends read worried us bit got hotel surprised ok rooms ok clean staff friendly yes hotel near gay cinema saw nothing also one side hotel see ladies busy windows business thought funny hey amsterdam overall husband plus friends really loved stay would definetly come stay ramada

Reviews.Title: “Great base for Berlin”
Reviews.Author: BearsdenBrian
Reviews.Content: september 21 2006 stayed 1 night hotel room small could hardly get bathroom could clearly smell heavy sheets etc noisy slamming doors etc worst midnight started new shift made noise couldnt sleep hours went reception met approx 15 guests problem terrible position telephone refused deal matter several holidays spoiled guests worst thing amsterdam building metro part construction taken place front hotel expectation metro knew knows working 24 hours day front hotel

Reviews.Title: “Much better than expected!”
Reviews.Author: 888travel
Reviews.Content: stay 3 nights read stayed hotel booked star room friends booked concerned hotel right hotel facilities poor room service restaurant open breakfast thats poor continental star room milk bath towels hand sized towels hotel bar mini bar slow response one person duty whole hotel reception nights ie trying deal persons complaints security concern work got moved another first night guess couldnt fix called note rooms double small youd like shower make star rooms seem larger bathrooms glass walls alone sharing friend may find far privacy goes unusual one person may issues sitting toilet shower wall bathroom space wide toilet bowl im 63 shoulders wouldnt fit gap amsterdam problems hotel gay adult cinema andor men visiting prostitutes along one side hotel perhaps friends stayed standard rooms time room allocated carpet nice good room points nice shower bath prepaid room said taxes paid checked hotel bill night left receptionist said owed taxes pointed accepted friends checked early receptionist charges checked later informed owed taxes explained already said friends paid said mistake charged asked refund amount upgraded facilities work change rooms refused felt rude back office disappeared summary bad customer service hotel facilities poor area exactly best rooms standard much better less money elsewhere great city

Reviews.Title: “Great value hotel”
Reviews.Author: Viking59
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights room small ok bathroom clean furniture need refurbishment small tv important travel car want leave public de consider additional per night

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: great hotel great location stayed 3 nights late june 2006 one â€“ whole bathroom thing described earlier reviews different yes found quite interesting wife fine staff helpful friendly breakfast fine included rate train station 5 minute walk dam square red light district etc close pedestrian way directly across street great quick food places cafes etc try â€“ place half ways great lunch would stay go back amsterdam â€“ get ok rate take
